tooltip.relics.minotaur_hoof.description: The hoof of a beast that guarded the heart of the underground labyrinth. Rumored to grant its wearer the speed and endurance of the frenzied minotaurs.
tooltip.relics.minotaur_hoof.ability.mom: While sprinting, gradually increases the player's movement speed up to %1$s%%. After 3 seconds of running, once the player reaches maximum speed, incoming damage is reduced by %2$s%%, and all nearby targets are knocked back and take %3$s damage until the player stops running.
tooltip.relics.minotaur_hoof.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each instance of damage dealt using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.hydra_heart.description: The most valuable part of the multi-headed fire-breathing serpent that dwells somewhere in the fiery depths of the Twilight Forest. Though its original owner is long dead, the heart still beats, dripping with searing blood.
tooltip.relics.hydra_heart.ability.hydra: When taking damage, has a %1$s%% chance to drop a blood droplet that, upon landing, creates a damaging area for %3$s seconds, dealing %2$s damage to all targets and igniting them for 5 seconds.
tooltip.relics.hydra_heart.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each blood droplet created by the %2$s ability.
item.reliquified_twilight_forest.gem.tip: Can be used to inlay the Lich Crown
Can be used to inlay the Lich Crown or to craft wands
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.description: The crown of the Twilight Forest’s very own king - the Lich. A symbol of his power and dominance. Legend has it that the true potential of this relic can only be unlocked by uniting all ten gems...
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.soulbo: Allows the crown to be inlaid with %1$s special gems. Each unique gem unlocks a new ability, while additional gems of the same type increase the level of the corresponding ability. To insert a gem into the crown, right-click it while holding it in your inventory. To remove a gem, ensure your cursor is empty and right-click the crown.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.bone_p: All skeletons become friendly towards the player.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.fortif: Every %2$s seconds, creates a shield around the player that completely blocks most directed attacks. The number of active shields cannot exceed %1$s at a time.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.lifedr: When the player's health falls below 20%, for 5 seconds, drains %1$s%% of their max health from all targets within %2$s blocks. Afterward, it enters a cooldown of %3$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.twilig: When looking at a target and pressing LMB, launches a twilight projectile moving at approximately %2$s blocks per second, dealing %1$s damage. Does not work if the target is within melee range.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.zombie: Every %3$s seconds, spawns a mini-zombie that fights for the player, dealing %2$s damage to targets. The total number of mini-zombies cannot exceed %1$s.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.leveling_sourc: Fortification
+%1$s experience points for each shield created by the %2$s ability.
Will to Live
+%1$s experience points for every 0.5 seconds of healing done by the %2$s ability.
Twilight Touch
+%1$s experience points for each hit landed with the projectile from the %2$s ability.
Risen Servants
+%1$s experience points for each mini-zombie spawned by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.firefly_queen.description: A fragile and slightly disgusting-looking insect capable of spawning a swarm of fireflies that will forever dispel any darkness.
tooltip.relics.firefly_queen.ability.glo: Generates a firefly larva in the internal buffer every %1$s seconds, with a maximum of %2$s at a time. When the player is in complete darkness, it consumes 1 larva and places a firefly nearby to light the way.
tooltip.relics.firefly_queen.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each firefly placed by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.cicada_bottle.description: A jar filled with the energy of hatred. Though this spawn of evil looks like a small bug, do not let your eyes deceive you. Its devilish song can evoke true rage in anyone who hears it, making them willing to do anything to make it stop.
tooltip.relics.cicada_bottle.ability.cic: Has a %1$s%% chance on hit to inflict the Cicada's Curse on the target for %2$s seconds, forcing all nearby mobs to attack that target, ignoring their other tasks.
tooltip.relics.cicada_bottle.leveling_so: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.deer_antler.description: A suspiciously large antler for an ordinary deer, which would look just as suspiciously fitting on some living creature.
tooltip.relics.deer_antler.ability.ride_: When used on a creature whose hitbox volume does not exceed %1$s blocks, places it on the player's antlers and prevents it from dealing damage to the player.
tooltip.relics.deer_antler.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for every 3 seconds spent with a creature on the antlers from the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.scaled_cloak.description: A cloak woven from giant serpent scales not only takes on the shape of its previous owner but also inherits some of her abilities.
tooltip.relics.scaled_cloak.ability.wall: Allows the player to smoothly climb walls for %1$s seconds. After the duration ends, the player will slowly slide down.
tooltip.relics.scaled_cloak.ability.elus: When taking damage, has a %1$s%% chance to make the attacker miss if the player maintains eye contact with them.
tooltip.relics.scaled_cloak.leveling_sou: +%1$s experience points for each second of climbing from the %2$s ability.
+%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.twilight_feather.descript: A feather from the tail of a mysterious bird that could transform into other creatures.
When attacking a target whose current health does not exceed the player's maximum health, there is a %1$s%% chance to instantly execute it, transforming it into a small bird.
tooltip.relics.twilight_feather.leveling: +%1$s experience points for each successful activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.thorn_crown.description: An ornament closely tied to torment. Its sharp thorns dig into the wearer's head, bringing both unbearable pain and paralyzing power.
tooltip.relics.thorn_crown.ability.pokin: Upon touching a target, deals %3$s damage and has a %1$s%% chance to paralyze them for %2$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.thorn_crown.ability.thorn: Grants the player full resistance to any 'thorn' damage.
tooltip.relics.thorn_crown.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each paralysis triggered by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.steel_cape.description: A remarkably flexible yet durable material forms the basis of this cape, providing not only protection for its wearer but also retaliation when their safety is threatened.
tooltip.relics.steel_cape.ability.iron_g: When taking damage that could potentially be mitigated by armor (even if none is equipped), reduces it by %1$s points. If the damage is not fully blocked, there is a %2$s%% chance to launch a steel orb toward the attacker, dealing %3$s damage to all in its path and stunning them for %4$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.steel_cape.leveling_sourc: +%1$s experience points for each steel orb released by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.charm_backpack.descriptio: A seemingly ordinary backpack, yet for some unknown reason, charms inside it behave differently...
tooltip.relics.charm_backpack.ability.ch: Allows storing up to %1$s life or inventory charms inside the backpack. When a charm activates, it prevents complete destruction and instead goes on cooldown for %2$s minutes per its level. To store a charm, right-click on the backpack in the inventory with it. To extract a charm, the cursor must be empty.
tooltip.relics.charm_backpack.leveling_s: +%1$s experience points for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.goblin_nose.description: A nose crudely taken from a goblin. No one suspected that goblins could shed skin like lizards...
tooltip.relics.goblin_nose.ability.vein_: When activated, worsens vision but enhances smell, allowing the detection of valuable ores within a %1$s block radius. Also allows storing up to %2$s ore blocks inside the nose, so the sense only recognizes them. To store ore, right-click the nose in the inventory with it. To extract ore, the cursor must be empty.
tooltip.relics.goblin_nose.leveling_sour: +%1$s experience points for each ore mined under the effect of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.giant_glove.description: A piece of gear once worn by fairy-tale giants who dwell in cloud-top huts. It's said the only way to reach them is with magic beans whose stalk pierces the skies...
tooltip.relics.giant_glove.ability.overs: Increases the size and stats of the held item by %1$s%%.
tooltip.relics.giant_glove.leveling_sour: +%1$s XP for each block broken or entity hit made with an item enhanced by %2$s.
tooltip.relics.chromatic_cloak.descripti: A stylish and vibrant cloak, woven from the wool of a mythical rainbow sheep...
tooltip.relics.chromatic_cloak.ability.w: Stores up to %1$s slots of wool with up to %2$s units each. Every wool color grants a specific effect, applied for %3$s seconds if not already active, consuming one unit of wool. To insert wool, right-click the cloak in inventory with wool; to extract, make sure the cursor holds no item.
tooltip.relics.chromatic_cloak.ability.e: Increases the effect level based on the number of identical-colored wool slots, up to a maximum level of %1$s.
tooltip.relics.chromatic_cloak.leveling_: +%1$s XP for each level of effect granted by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.frostb: Applies a stacking frostbite effect for %1$s seconds on attack. Once the effect exceeds 7 seconds, the target takes 1 damage through armor every 2 seconds until the effect ends.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.leveling_sourc: Frostbite
+%1$s XP for each frostbite effect applied by %2$s.
tooltip.relics.maple_syrup_bottle.descri: An endless syrup bottle that occasionally conjures up fresh waffles.
tooltip.relics.maple_syrup_bottle.abilit: Eating a waffle increases health regeneration by %2$s%% for %3$s seconds; the effect stacks. There's a %1$s%% chance the waffle won't be consumed.
tooltip.relics.invisibility_cloak.descri: A strange thing – stare at it long enough and it... starts vanishing? Hard to imagine why the emperor needed such a cloak...
tooltip.relics.invisibility_cloak.abilit: Hides the appearance of equipped armor.
Grants full invisibility after remaining completely still or sneaking without interruption for at least %1$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.invisibility_cloak.leveli: +%1$s XP for each activation of the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.parasite_115.description: ...deep within the prison chambers of the §kDark§r Tower, inmate number 115 was forcibly infected with an unknown §kparasite§r. The §klarva§r entwined with his body, feeding on his §kmind§r and flesh until only a twisted mass of reddish §krot§r remained. The warped minds of the wardens immediately forced the §kunfortunate soul§r from the neighboring cell to taste the result. He resisted, but once a piece touched his tongue...
tooltip.relics.parasite_115.ability.infe: Has a %1$s%% chance to infect the attacked target with a parasite, which, if the target is not attacked again within 5 seconds, delivers %2$s rapid strikes dealing %3$s damage each. If the target is killed by the parasite's attack, a random amount of §kExperiment 115§r will drop, up to %4$s units.
tooltip.relics.parasite_115.leveling_sou: +%1$s XP for each parasite infection caused by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.parasite_116.description: ...suddenly he began to tremble, his body arching as if §ksomething§r inside tried to break free. His eyes turned white, and with a mad roar he attacked a warden, then another, and another... until no one remained in his path. He awoke deep within the §kwilderness§r of the Twilight Forest - wounded, barefoot, covered in blood. Who knows if it was his last meal to blame, or if he is now the victim of a new experiment - §k116§r.
tooltip.relics.parasite_116.ability.infe: Has a %1$s%% chance to infect the attacked target with a parasite, which, if the target is not attacked again within 5 seconds, delivers %2$s rapid strikes dealing %3$s damage each. If the target is killed by the parasite's attack, a random amount of §kExperiment 115§r will drop, up to %4$s units.
tooltip.relics.parasite_116.ability.rage: Consuming §kExperiment 115§r restores %1$s%% rage charge, which is consumed at a rate of 10%% per second. Rage increases the player's movement speed, attack speed, and damage. At 100%% rage, the bonus reaches %2$s%%.
tooltip.relics.parasite_116.leveling_sou: +%1$s XP for each parasite infection caused by the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.mirror: Any attack on the player has a %1$s%% chance to be reflected back to the attacker, healing the player for the amount of damage dealt.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.leveling_sourc: Mirror Leech
+%1$s XP for each full unit of damage reflected using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.vendet: Attacking a target that damaged the player in the last %1$s seconds increases damage by %2$s%%.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.leveling_sourc: Vendetta
+%1$s XP for each attack with increased damage from the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.biome_: Increases damage dealt by %1$s%% for every 0.1 unit of biome temperature where the player is located.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.leveling_sourc: Heat Concentration
+%1$s XP for each attack with bonus damage from the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.ethere: Any projectile aimed at the player passes through without causing harm. After %1$s deflections, the ability goes on cooldown for %2$s seconds.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.leveling_sourc: Ethereal Transformation
+%1$s XP for each projectile deflected using the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.frenzy: Attacking different targets consecutively increases damage by %1$s%% per hit. Damaging a previously attacked target or not attacking for more than 5 seconds resets the bonus. Killing a target while the effect is active resets the target list without losing the accumulated bonus.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.leveling_sourc: Frenzy
+%1$s XP for each bonus gained from the %2$s ability.
tooltip.relics.lich_crown.ability.twilig: Grants full immortality within the boundaries of the Twilight Forest.
